definition: Old World gooselike duck slightly larger than a mallard with variegated mostly black-and-white plumage and a red bill
details:
noun
- Old World gooselike duck slightly larger than a mallard with variegated mostly black-and-white plumage and a red bill
- large crested fish-eating diving duck having a slender hooked bill with serrated edges
= synonyms: merganser, fish duck, sawbill
